release.action: Updated to eplatform 3.1.85 with dwr 2.0.1 and core updates. Also updated member 3.1.2, member.isi 3.1.3 and national registry modules.

Updated to ePlatform 3.1.79 with numerous changes and fixes for Felix Finished moving the userapp to the workspace and AdminMenu now forwards to the workspace Updated news,text,category and cal. Set the stylesheet path in the ibxml
Completed merging an refactored golf stuff to is.idega.idegaweb.member.isi.block.golf.
First version of the Sports Federation member system webapplication.
